author: Patrick Strudwick
title: This Man Decided To Stay With His Dad In Isolation From Coronavirus For 12 Weeks. It Meant Not Seeing His Boyfriend
description: "The moment I leave this house I won’t be able to come back, so what do I do?" As vulnerable people are isolated from Coronavirus 3 months, Sam Dowler describes the agonising choices facing their loved ones. View Entire Post ›
content: It was when the health secretary said on TV about people with myeloma being at high risk that we just went, Oh shit, says Sam Dowler, 42. He lives with his father, Graham, 74, in Hertfordshire, caring for him with his mother as they manage the treatment for G… [+10234 chars]
